com.google.code.jyield
Class Loggable

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.jyield.Loggable

public class Loggable
extends java.lang.Object

Provides classes with added logging capabilities and simplifies logging.

Author:
Michael Aaron Safyan

entering

protected void entering(java.lang.String func,
                        java.lang.Object... params)
Use this function at the beginning of your function definitions to log, at the trace level, entering the body of your function.

Parameters:
func - The name of the function being entered.
params - The parameters passed into the function being entered.

exiting

protected void exiting(java.lang.String func)
Use this function at the end of your function definitions to log, at the trace leevel, exiting the body of yoru function. Be sure to catch all branches out -- including those resulting from throws and returns.

Parameters:
func - The name of the function being exited.

exiting

protected void exiting(java.lang.String func,
                       java.lang.Object result)
Use this function at the end of your function definitions to log, at the trace leevel, exiting the body of yoru function. Be sure to catch all branches out -- including those resulting from throws and returns.

Parameters:
func - The name of the function being exited.
result - The result being returned.
